Kael'thas.name: Flamestrike
Kael'thas.description: After 1 second, deal 320 (+4% per level) damage in an area.   Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

Kael'thas.name: Living Bomb
Kael'thas.description: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.  Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

Kael'thas.name: Gravity Lapse
Kael'thas.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second.   Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

Kael'thas.name: Pyroblast
Kael'thas.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

Kael'thas.name: Phoenix
Kael'thas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

Kael'thas.name: Verdant Spheres
Kael'thas.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Kael'thas's Ability Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 3.9% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next Basic Attack to instead deal 165 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1 second.

16.name: Arcane Dynamo
16.description: Using a Basic Ability increases Kael'thas's Ability Power by 3% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50% and reduces its cooldown by 25 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.
